tool_description: An API for looking up, checking, or searching issuer card information using the card BIN (Bank Identification Number).

api_list.name: BIN/IIN Lookup
api_list.description: This API allows users to retrieve issuer card information by inputting the first six digits of a credit or debit card.

required_parameters.name: bin
required_parameters.description: The first six digits of the credit or debit card.
